metadata.description: A GlobalReplicationGroup acts as the parent of multiple regional ReplicationGroups, enabling cross-region active-active replication for Redis/Valkey. One ReplicationGroup is designated the primary (source), and additional ReplicationGroups in other AWS regions become secondary members. The GlobalReplicationGroup must exist before secondary regional clusters can join it.

patch.description: The ReplicationGroup references a GlobalReplicationGroup ID to join the cross-region replication topology.
The GlobalReplicationGroup provides its ID for regional ReplicationGroups to reference.
